TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AudioSessionRouteChangeReason extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The reason for AudioSession route change event to be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioToolbox.AudioSessionRouteChangeReason CategoryChange = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioToolbox.AudioSessionRouteChangeReason NewDeviceAvailable = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A new audio device has been plugged.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioToolbox.AudioSessionRouteChangeReason NoSuitableRouteForCategory = int32(7)

Docs.summary: There is no audio device for the current set category in the audio session. For example, recording when there is no microphone available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioToolbox.AudioSessionRouteChangeReason OldDeviceUnavailable = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The previous device is no longer available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioToolbox.AudioSessionRouteChangeReason Override = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Audio has been forcibly been redirected by the user setting the AudioSession Category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioToolbox.AudioSessionRouteChangeReason Unknown = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The route changed, but there is no information about why.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioToolbox.AudioSessionRouteChangeReason WakeFromSleep = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Device has woken up from sleep
